docs.title: 👋 Hi, I'm Junjie Zhou
docs.text: Exploring the beautiful intersection of science and technology.

docs.title: 🧑‍💻 About Me
docs.text: I'm a Computer Science student driven by curiosity and a love for discovery. My journey weaves through the abstractions of 🧮 mathematics and the laws of 🌌 physics, always seeking the magic that happens where different fields meet. ✨

docs.title: 🌱 Current Interests
docs.text:
• 🤖 Artifical Intelligence
  • 🧠 Cognitive Science
  • 🌌 Physics
  • 💡 Philosophy

docs.title: 🚀 My Work
docs.text:
• Learning Compass A web application designed to enhance the online learning experience with tools for course management, AI-powered assistance, real-time chat, note-taking, and more.
  • More Projects Coming Soon!

docs.title: 💭 Thoughts & Resources
docs.text:
“The best way to predict the future is to invent it. But first, we must understand the present through multiple lenses of knowledge.”

  • MIT OpenCourseWare
  • Berkeley Course Guides

docs.text:
